hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio website. I am a passionate developer and designer.

about.title: About Me
about.introduction: I'm Juliana Amorim, a Full-Stack Web Developer and UX/UI Designer dedicated to crafting intuitive and impactful digital experiences.

factoria.title: Factor√≠a F5
factoria.description: An inclusive digital school in Spain, offering intensive, high-impact training in mobile and web development, aiming to provide access to high-demand employment opportunities.

tramontana.title: Instituto Tramontana
tramontana.description: A business school with a humanistic and multidisciplinary approach, focusing on elevating professionals who create products and services.

nuclio.title: Nuclio Digital School
nuclio.description: A leading digital training institution in Spain, offering Master's programs in areas like UX/UI Design and Full Stack Development, emphasizing practical, hands-on learning.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Crafting stunning and responsive websites that capture your brand's essence and engage your audience.

uiUxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiUxDesign.description: Enhancing UX with intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interface designs for both web and mobile applications.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Building robust, scalable, and high-performance websites using the latest technologies to ensure a seamless UX.

creatureDesign.title: Creature Design
creatureDesign.fullDescription: A series of creature designs exploring organic forms and textures. Each creature is carefully crafted to balance both aesthetic appeal and anatomical plausibility, pushing the boundaries between reality and imagination.

characterDesign.title: Character Design
characterDesign.fullDescription: Character design project focusing on creating unique personalities through detailed modeling and texturing. Each character tells its own story through carefully crafted features and expressions.

environmentDesign.title: Environment Design
environmentDesign.fullDescription: Environmental design project showcasing the creation of immersive spaces. Each environment is designed to tell a story through atmospheric lighting and detailed texturing.
